Message.Msg: This post by Gia2Mia is extremely important ... it brings to light the TRUE facts of what DELL is all about ... DO NOT listen to the analysts wtih their negative agendas ... Fact is Fact ... Good Post...

Message.Title: NEW TOP OF THE LINE DELL XPS 15 L521X IS A LEMON
Message.Msg: Top of the line, unfortunately, cannot maintain an internet connection. dell stock is sinking because of the rising costs of on site servicing and replacing defective laptops. sorry.
